description: Document extraction, validation, and evidence standards for work permit applications. Includes base requirements, category-specific requirements, and evidence grading system.

document_structure.base_requirements: Common documents for all work permits (passport, medical, police cert, CV, statement, etc.)
document_structure.category_specific: Additional documents required by permit category: PGWP, LMIA, IMP, ICT, Open Work Permit, PNP
document_structure.evidence_grading: A/B/C/D evidence classification with weight matrix and sufficiency scoring

evidence_grades.C: Self-prepared or supporting documents, moderate weight
